Package com.google.code.rees.scope.struts2.ui

Class Summary
ConversationForm A normal Struts2 Form that maps to a different default template for including the conversation IDs as hidden tags in the form
ConversationFormTag A normal FormTag using ConversationForm instead of Form
Conversations A custom UIBean that places the conversation IDs as hidden fields in a page
ConversationsTag A custom AbstractUITag that uses the Conversations bean to add the conversation IDs to a page
ConversationUrlTag A normal Struts2 URLTag, but additionally includes the conversation IDs as parameters on the URL
